chunk:
Ktchn Apothecary Radiance Renewal Face Oil

Brand: Ktchn Apothecary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Botanical Squalane, Vitus Vinifera (Chardonnay Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip), Organic Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil, Emblica Officinalis (Indian Gooseberry) Fruit Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose)

Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip), Organic Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil, Emblica Officinalis (Indian Gooseberry) Fruit Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil

Directions: Apply 2-3 Drops to face, neck & upper chest. Gently massage into skin. Apply in the morning & evening. Follow with Perfecting Elixir Facial Serum & Revitalizing Facial Cream. (Apply anywhere for a boost of rejuvenating radiance including arms, back of hands, hair, & more.)
Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
